articles.description: Telling James Anderson it is time to step aside shows a ruthlessness from Brendon McCullum and Ben Stokes that should end suggestions of a cosy England dressing room, writes Stephan Shemilt.
articles.title: James Anderson retires: Brendon McCullum & Ben Stokes show ruthlessness as England build for Ashes

articles.description: Manchester United manager Erik ten Hag says he has never regretted taking the job despite the club’s current problems.
articles.title: Erik ten Hag: Manchester United boss has no regrets over taking job

articles.description: The Boston Celtics regain the lead in their NBA Eastern Conference semi-final against the Cleveland Cavaliers with a 106-93 victory on the road.
articles.title: NBA play-offs 2024: Boston Celtics retake lead over Cleveland Cavaliers

articles.description: Britain's Dina Asher-Smith wins gold in the 200m at the Jamaica Athletics Invitational in Kingston.
articles.title: Jamaica Athletics Invitational 2024: Dina Asher-Smith wins 200m gold

articles.description: Rory McIlroy cuts Xander Schauffele's lead at the Wells Fargo Championship to one shot with a superb third round in North Carolina.
articles.title: Wells Fargo Championship: Rory McIlroy one shot behind  Xander Schauffele  after third round

articles.description: David Moyes receives a fitting farewell from West Ham fans in his final home game in charge as the club's new era draws closer.
articles.title: David Moyes: West Ham fans give fitting send-off to departing manager

articles.description: Lauren Price becomes Wales’ first female world champion boxer as she wins via a wide points decision against Jessica McCaskill.
articles.title: Lauren Price vs Jessica McCaskill: Welsh boxer wins world title
